gudi

My group just bought this game ~3 hours ago.  We refunded it ~2 hours later.  We're your average group of gamers, so we figure our experience is probably typical.  We didn't do extensive research of the game beforehand - few people really do - but our experience is likely one that a lot of people have had/are likely to repeat.  We never got far enough to experience the imbalances that others here claim exist, but here are a few of the reasons why we refunded - 

You can't party up for public matches.  You need a full lobby of people you know to have a fair private match.  You rarely have exactly this many people.

You can't earn perks (blatant advantages) in a private lobby (the only way to play with friends).

The switch roles button doesn't work.

The lobby bugged constantly.  Some people could join but wouldn't appear.  Others joined twice somehow, filling up two slots.

Game options aren't comprehensive, flexible, or complete.  Poor video option editing, no keybind editing, no mouse sensitivity editing, etc.

There's no way to communicate with others in-game. (VoIP will always be a thing. This can me mitigated and balanced against by allowing survivors to emote or have voice/proximity-voice chat)

There's little variety as would be expected from a complete game release.

They're already talking about future paid DLC while the game remains unfinished.

This should really be branded early access.  As of now it's incomplete.

I know that they're claiming fixes & implementations are on the way, but the game has hype right now, and it doesn't have the above expected features right now.  Promises are worth very little in the context of video game development, and groups like mine probably won't stick around until these things are either illuminated or fixed

O que era ruim, ficou ainda pior. Agora tem um assassino que usa TELETRANSPORTE!!!!!!

Se você acha que é parecido com massacre da serra Eletrica, já fique sabendo que tem um assassino INVISIVEL, e outro que da TELETRANSPORTE!

_______________________________________________________________________________


Não recomendo o jogo apenas por causa do Assassino Invisivel.

Quando comprei o jogo, imaginei algo parecido com o massacre da Serra Eletrica, e é!
É algo genial! 
O jogo é realmente bom, mas o assassino invisivel torna o jogo fantasioso.
Vejamos, em nenhum filme do massacre da Serra Eletrica tem um assassino invisivel, pq nesse jogo vai ter ?

Os desenvolvedores acertaram em TUDO, exceto no assassino invisivel.

Quando você está proximo do assassino, o seu batimento cardiaco fica mais alto, mas perto, você já fica com medo e talz, rola uma emoção sinistra!! Mas com o assassino invisivel não fica, o que tira totalmente a graça de jogar. Ele aparece atras de você do nada, enquanto você está consertando o gerador e te mata. 

Eu entro na partida, vejo que o assassino é invisivel e já disconecto, e MUITA gente faz o mesmo. Tornando o jogo extremamente desagradavel, apenas por causa de um Assassino, que TODOS pegam. 

Vão realmente estragar o jogo por causa de um Assassino que ngm gosta ?

First of all, I'd like to say that I really love this game. It's something I'd been hoping would be created for a while, and after it's release I fell in love with the game.

As a fan of the horror genre since the early days of Resident Evil 1, Silent Hill, and Amnesia, I think it's a fun twist to put another human being as the killer, as a player with actual thoughts and ideas is much more terrifying than an AI.

For people who have been throwing bad reviews to this game, sure it has some downsides, but every game does. Rather than tossing down a gauntlet and challenging people to internet flame wars, as most 'hate posts' do, Ignore them. I've yet to see a constructive negative review, most people either have a grudge against the publisher or just dislike the game.

This game is a must have, especially if you enjoy horror, and if you have friends who'd like to join in as well.


There are a few issues I've been having lately, and I know some of them have been addressed in the 'Developers Addressing Major Issues' post, but there are somethings that I think may be sort of overlooked.


Matchmaking Time to Full Lobby -

Perhaps it's just my location or maybe just bad luck, but often times I find myself waiting anywhere from 5-10 minutes to get a game, sometimes up to 10-15 if I feel like playing the killer. I know part of the problem is the current issue of 'Lobby Hopping', since there is no implemented ranked party system at the moment, but it seems like a bit more of an issue than that. As a survivor, I often am brought to the loading screen and kicked right back to the lobby, failing to find a match, which tends to increase the time to wait.

Lack of Survivor Communication in Game

Maybe gestures, or maybe proximity voice chat that can be heard by both the hunter and the hunted. I feel like the game ends up being 1v 1,1,1,1 instead of 1v4, because there is a lack of communication and cooperation between players. Simply spinning in circles and crouching down/standing up isn't quite enough to communicate your plans and ideas to your fellow survivors.

'Puppy Guards'

Ever jumped into a game, got hunted down or watched someone else get caught, and then watch as the killer stands by them and hits them repeatedly until they're sacrificed? It's a problem currently. Sure you can go grab the generators while he's doing this, but it ruins the game for that one person who has to sit there on the hook. 

Perhaps lower the rate at which the sacrifice ticks down while the killer is nearby, or give a lower score to killers who sit within a few meters of the hook. 

It's not a serious problem per-se, as there can be ways to deal with it, or you can just escape while he's doing this to another survivor, but it does ruin the game for the one guy unless they just struggle and let themselves get killed to leave for another game, but doing that gives the killer exactly what they want, easy points with no downside, and allows them to go after another survivor to hang up and sit by for more points. Wash, Rinse, Repeat.

Pick-Me-Up with Med Kit

I think there should be a (SLOW) way to pick yourself up if you have access to a medkit. As much as this should be a team game with cooperation, without a party matchmaking system currently, no one every seems to care about the other players or the coop aspect of the game. You typically have to fend for yourself, but once you're downed like that there's nothing to really do except exit the game. Perhaps offer a 'Quick Way Out' to downed survivors so they don't have to DC and lose what points they gathered through the game, if a pick yourself up function won't be added.

DING-DONG-DING-DONG-DING-DONG

There are certain spots in the maps where the wraith(And other killers can, but it's much harder) can press themselves up against you to trap you there with no way out, sort of like corner trapping in older FPS games. Sort of the same issue with Puppy Guarding. The wraith goes invisible, sneaks up on you, and instead of killing you traps you in a corner in a building and stands there while doing nothing. It's a problem when said player ends up being the only one left, and just has to sit there until they get bored and DC, or the killer DCs, because there's no way around and no way out.



These are just a couple issues I found through playing. 

Great game, great concept and great design, and I know things are getting fixed up properly. For those of you still questioning whether or not you would like to purchase this game, you can always wait to see if some of the issues are fixed in a future patch, but I strongly suggest you start playing now, as you're missing out on some quality content.

Thanks for providing such a captivating and entertaining game.

[h1] Before You Buy, Don't Let the Concept Fool You [/h1]

I really wanted to like this game. I even made a positive review for it a few days ago praising it and saying it has a few frustrations. No, I lied to you and myself. It has more than just a few. It's hard to recommend this game right now because it has terrible execution to a good concept. That's what makes people fall in love with this game but it's frustrating to play when the map design is more for the killer rather than the survivors and not to mention the killer, Wraith, is just plain unfair. More on that later. I want to recommend this game because it can be fun and it can be interesting but it's so buggy and unstable at times, which is almost all the time.

The controls are perfect for the keyboard and mouse set up, though. It also has controller support (haven't tried) but if you've played a 3rd person shooter or something, you will probably get used to this game's control scheme fast and it's not that confusing for the killer either. That's pretty much it. It's not complicated and the game will often remind you what button to push for certain actions. The survivor part is clearly more fun but also quite frustrating since the map design is hard to get around when balancing a game like this. I can tell the developers of this game tried to make it as fair as possible but there's 3 maps so far and the 2 of them benefit the killer more. In my opinion, anyway. The other is clearly more for survivors because there's a ton of hiding spots. The objective as the killer is capture all survivors and hang them on a hook till they give up and die to be sacrificed to the great God, Macho Man Randy Savage, ooh yeah (No, not really)! That wouldn't be a problem but 90% of all players stick around till they die and you have 4 chances (if you do it in a row) to escape from the hook before you have to hold off a claw hook thing from stabbing you. This is a real problem because the killers heavily discourage the survivors from saving their friends which the game itself rewards you for doing it. I feel like they have to add a disadvantage for the killer to camp around but also add an advantage. Like, the HP of the hooked survivor goes down faster when the killer is around but the killer is stripped of their ability to swing their weapon while doing so. I feel like this could fix a problem while making it not completely unfair for the killer or survivors. The objective for the survivors is to fix 5 generators to power 2 gates that you can choose to open and escape through intact. The generators have QTEs that randomly pop up, its a arrow moving in circular motion and you need to catch it in a certain area at the right time and if you fuck it up, boom, killer knows your location. You can gain bonus from it by hitting the small part of the certain area that is white. There is tall grass and trees, ruins, and windows for the survivors to use to avoid the killer. You can even throw down these palettes that block the killer off or even stun them if you throw it down at the right time. The killer can break through it, of course. There is 3 killers in the game. Hillbilly is the guy that has a machete and can lay down bear traps. The Chainsaw guy has a chainsaw but is the slowest but can down the survivors in one hit with the chainsaw. The Wraith, who is the most unfair, can turn invisible. The game has a heartbeat system, by the way, so when a killer get's close, you hear the heartbeat sound get louder as they get closer. With the Wraith, the heart beat disappears too when it's invisible and the only real disadvantage is has is that it can't attack in it's invisible state. The players can also hide in these closets placed throughout the map but honestly, they only really come in handy when the killer is already occupied chasing someone else and you need to get out of the way.

Let's get to the technical stuff, this game, admittedly, has a pretty cool progression system for each killer and each survivor (4 survivors) and when you complete a match or lose one, you gain bloodpoints(?) and you can spend those on this. It's kind of like a skill tree but you get most of your items here(temporary though), item add ons (to make the items better), perks (permanent), and offerings (which give you a bonus for one game, like more mist during the match or one less hook in the map). When you complete a game, it adds up all the points in 4 categories: Survival, Objective, Boldness, and Teamwork (it's called something else). This also contributes towards the....sorry almost threw up...towards the God awful, ranking system that is pretty much broken. It's so unforgiving that even surviving isn't enough because you need to have a certain amount of points to gain 1/3 pips. You can gain two in one match if you fill all categories but fat fucking chance of that happening often. You start from 20 and you go all the way down to rank 1. Does it hold any benefits though? Fuck no. As far as I'm concerned, I never left Rank 20 because if you don't reach the amount to gain one pip, you lose one instead and you get de-ranked too when you have none starting off at the rank, it basically equals previous rank with 3/3 pips. You have to do more unnecessary shit in order to not lose a rank and that isn't even worth it. This is incredibly frustrating and pointless to even have in the first place. The killer side also has one as well. I don't know much about the killer other than he is in first person perspective, has a weapon, and hangs survivors on the hook. I did play as one, a few handful of times, and honestly, as frustrating as it is to be a survivor, being one is better than a killer, in my opinion. The killer can also rip the player from doing something anytime and carry them right away. Like, unhooking their friend, climbing through a window, working on a generator, etc... 

The graphics look nice and the animations are basic which is also fine. The character models look fine and the monster designs look bad ass in each of their own way. The game lacks graphical options. It just gives you the bare bones basic of Ultra, High, Medium, or Low. That's it. Maybe the scale down your resolution too, otherwise, I shame the game for having lack of graphical options for those trying to squeeze out all the performance they can on their low end machines. I have a high end machine so no I'm not bitter about this due to experiencing it.

The sound design is important because you will know when the killer is near you and can identify who the killer type is because they make certain sounds like the wraith uses a bell that the whole map (almost) can hear, the Hillbilly hollers, and the chainsaw guy, has a chainsaw...so chainsaw noise. The generators can backfire on the survivors if they fail the QTEs and that makes a loud enough noise to give the killer your position away with a visual cue. This game has a lot of noise basically and its rather important since you're not facing AI here.

The game can be replayable when it works right when not having connection issues or not crashing either. There's no party system unless you create a private match inviting all friends. The game is poorly executed that the more I play it, the worse the experience gets. It just doesn't seem like it holds up well and its a buggy game right now. Only having one way to escape all the time unless you are the only survivor, then you can find a hatch to escape through but nothing special really. I don't see it holding up too long.

All these issues can be fixed in the future and I hope they will be. Right now, is not the time. Its a fun game but it has too many frustrating aspects about it that really hold it back to its true potential and therefore, I can't really recommend it. I had fun while it lasted but it just wears on you the issues it has and the amount of bugs it contains. It's just not a good time right now. The game could of used more polish and time.

Good old Cat and Mouse with a devious twist. 
Soooo much adrenaline or pure sadistic fun, depending on who you play.
It's been a while since I found myself screaming in terror twitching in front of my PC.

That moment when you know the killer has seen you, and you frantically try to get away.
The chase is always hilariously tense, whether be it youre the hunted or the hunter.

As a sidenote, don't believe the whine.
Windowhopping can be countered if you have working brain.
Same goes for Hook Camping.

I fully recommend getting this game.
It will touch you deep down in the darkest parts of your conciousness..


EDIT AFTER 120 hours: still love it!
DON'T belive the whine!

This is my first review, and I'm happy that this game is my first review.

Dead by Daylight is nothing short of a breath of fresh air. I have never experienced anything like this game.

This 4v1 horror survival game will make you scream, laugh, and panic. The thrill of the game is simply amazing. Whether you are hunting down your prey, or simply attempting to flee the chainsaw wielding hillbilly chasing you, the game is a race of emotions that will leave you with endless hours of fun.

Beyond that, however, as you play, the kinks begin to reveal themselves. 

You quickly realize that there are easy exploits and straight broken attributes to the game. And while it still is a largely skill based game, these exploits and attributes can seriously make you want to quit.

Example: You're killer. You hit someone. They hop through a window and begin to self heal. You have two options, go through the window, or go around through another door. Both take very long. Let's say you go through the window. Surprise! The survivor just went through the window just to the left of the window you went through. The survivor self heals and easily escapes unharmed. You just wasted a bunch of time. 

This example highlights two game breaking tools in the game: self healing, and infinite window juking. It is one of 4-5 issues that the developers are looking into at this moment, and hope to fix very soon.

In all, I think this game is simply stellar. I love it, it's great, it's 10/10 easily, despite the problems. It's fun, it's something new, and if you and four of your friends get this game, it will offer tons of fun.

Get this game, trust me. It's pure fun.

Survivor: It's fun, sometimes except when your the first one hooked and your team makes no effort to save you and you just feel bad for the killer when he finally hooks the person whos rank 7 after 10 min of Juking, and then the hooker disconects.
Also I KNOW PEOPLE SAY ITS EASY but at least give us a heartbeat for when the wraiths invisible or make him move slower PLEASE. Im also sure many people (Killers mostly, and maybe some survivors who like a challange) would like to see the "Sprint Burst" perk nerfed, (For those of you who dont know, it lets the survivor move at 150% speed at max level).

Killer: It can also be very fun but most of the time its either boring or frustrating, (25% Fun, 50% Dull, and 25% Frustrating).
It can be fun when the guy whos been juking you for about 10 minutes finally screws up, and you put him on the hook and because hes soooo importent to you(me, mostly) camp him, because you really lucked out when you caught him so theres the 50% dull and when hes about to die, 1 of 2 things can happen; 1)He takes it like a man and dies, you feel awesome and get some nice Bloodpoints or 2, he could wuss out and Alt-F4 out, not lose any points and keep his rank which they really need to patch(Read the note, they're gonna fix it, Yaaaaaaaay!).

Alll in all, there are some bugs, big and small which the devs need to fix and 1 more request, please FOR THE LOVE OF GOD, ADD A MUSIC AND SFX SLIDER. Have a good one

Adrenalini iliklerinize kadar hissedeceğiniz bir oyun. Özellikle "av"sanız. 

Oyunda 1 katil ve 4 kurban bulunuyor, kurbanların görevleri haritada olan 5 adet jenaratörü açıp katili alt etmek ancak bu 
iş tabii ki o kadar kolay değil. Oyun başlar başlamaz sizi atmosferine öyle bir çekiyor ki bir anda diğer oyunculardan ayrı kalıp " ben neredeyim " moduna girebiliyorsunuz. Hele o ayıdan bozma katil gelirken atan kalp atışlarınızı duymanız yok mu, hemen saklansanız iyi olur çünkü katil size geliyor!

Henüz katil olarak oynamadım ancak kısa süre onu da oynayacağım. Yazdıklarım kurban olan insan üzerineydi.

Oyunu almalı mıyım? Bence almalısınız, akşam ışıkları kapatıp kulaklığı da takarak oynadığınızda zaten siz de iyi ki almışım diyeceksiniz.

Overall, I love this game. Exciting, great gameplay. But I do have a few minor complaints.
There needs to be some sort of system for punishing people who quit mid-game. Also, I think it's totally appropriate to be able to derank within a level (I.e, having one mark out of three on level 20 and losing that mark after not doing so well) but I think being able to derank between levels is terrible (i.e Deranking from 19 back to 20). 

8/10, would get murdered again. Could easily be a 10 with a few slight adjustments.

On realese I gave this game a negative rating but now lobbies are smooth. Playing with or without friends as a survivor is viable and a lot of fun. Playing as the killer is fun as well but its hard to find lobbies if you are new, get ready to wait 30-40 minutes waiting for survivors to join. 

The game has added a lot of killers and survivors some of which were free DLC, all in all I recommend this game if you are intrested in this genre, though the learning curve is a little steep

I was really excited about this game.  Paid for the delux version, got in on the Beta.  At release this game is so buggy it's nearly impossible to play.  Matches lag and disconnect.  Characters get stuck in objects.  Even just getting a game to start in the buggy lobby with players dropping in and out can take 10-15 minutes.  Then when you end up encountering a glitch you have to start all over in the lobby.  It's just so frusterating to play.

Dead By Daylight is an assymetrical Survival/Horror game Where 4 survivors face off against the killer who will try to down them with two hits (one with hillbilly's chainsaw) then sacrifice them on a meat hook to The Entity.The Survivors are by far more agile than the killer but in a straight grund race they will lose,So survivors must throw down barriers and hop windows to escape the killer. the Survivors must also power 5/7 generators throughout the map,Team work is almost always essential to your survival so be a team palyer. After 5/7 generators are powered the survivors must power any number of two doors to escape or if you're the last survivor you may escape through a secret hatch hidden somewhere in the level after at least 2/7 generators are powered.The killer is faster as previously stated and they have map contol abilities such as traps and speed boosts but they must stay on their toes as their view is limited by first-person while the survivors have the added power of third-person view.

Pros
:Great Gameplay
:Scary at times,Makes your heart race all the time
:Easy To learn,Hard To master
:Fun to Play
:Decent price made better by summer sale and even more so if you own PayDay 2
:Gorgeous Graphics
:Can have some really intense moments
:Hard but not punishing
:Level up system is fun and makes you Think about your choices

Cons
:Has some game breaking glitches(falling out of map etc..)
:No Party system for quick play
:Trying to get yourself a hook is usually in vain and will just waste your time
: no voice chat for survivors
:Window Looping
:Alt+f4 Glitch(losses don't count against you)
:Killers have to host (crap killer internet=Crappy round)
:No Cd on wraiths bell
:Hatches are to easy to find

Other than that i enjoy this game alot and highly recommend it to any one who enjoys survival horror games.Overall i give Dead By Daylight (DbD) an 8.5/10 score in my opinion.

Отличная игра, особенно если играть с компанией друзей)

Melhor lobby simulator :D

Что могу сказать, игра отличная стоит своей цены. Тем более по скидке!! Берите не пожалеете. Перейдем к мини-обзору.

Плюсы:

+ Интересный геймплей

+ Много разновидностей перкови и аддонов, которые можно подобрать по своему вкусу.

+ Ощущается хоррор, бегать от психов или тролить их весело :3

+ Хорошее будущее у игры. Часто видно работу разработчиков.

+ Школота долго здесь не проживет.

+ Не казуально, надо продумать на шаг вперед убийцы или выжившего.

+ Интересные биографии персонажей и убийц ^_^.

+ Появился Русский язык ;3.

Ну, перейдем к минусам:

- Смотря по процентам достижений, не многим игра нравится, или просто не могут понять как в ее играть.

- Появился неприятный баг. Играя за убийцу, очень долго приходится ждать людей. Иногда помогает смена региона в стиме.

- Если не любите тролить людей и издеваться, игра не для вас. Быстро надоест.

- Играть с друзьями нельзя, только если в приват режиме. Ну, можно сказать, это плюс и минус. Смотря с какой стороны посмотреть.

Больше пока не заметил минусов.

Советую взять эту замечательную игру и насладиться побегами или охотой. ;3
I can't play with my friends in an online match? refund! thanks for making this decision easy for me! I'll take another look after they change it.

It can be very fun, I enjoy having the killer run right past me as I hide in the grass. Or actually surviving (Which sadly doesn't happen that much). Joining a match can sometimes take awhile, but recently its gotten a lot better. I love that the survivors are in third person and the killer is in first person. It helps survivors a lot, but when I'm the killer I tend to get a headache after three or four rounds because I'm squinting since it's very blurry. I can still see the hiding survivors though, and that's the point. Not to make it too easy to see them.

I extremely dislike being the last survivor because the killer ends up toying with you. Then I'm forced to leave and I don't get all those points I tried getting. Or if you get caught and get hung on a hook you kinda shrug and give up because the killer will camp you. So, why bother trying to survive? We all know the killer camps because if they can get at least one kill they win even if a few survivors still escape.

Now when I win instead of "Yay I finally did it!", I feel "Finally. After ten losses, we won."

Now I've been reading alot of reviews and threads about this game, people down talking the camping of killers, survivors and killers abilities pros/cons, and how little 12 year olds complain about getting killed. Now for those of u that dont know this game, or how to go about playing it, this game is simple beyond belief and u dont need mics to comunicate with team members. I for one take the time to write messages in the opening to discuss what to do with campers this is simple and if we spread the word in each game we play, itll be alot more fun, and full of less camping idiots. Now for starters tell all ur team mates in the chat this "if the killer is camping, hold M1 while on the hook so the bar fills half way, then release and continue to do so till the killer is  nolonger thier" now this leaves your teammates 2 decisions. A.) they can either team 1 player distracts the killer and draws him away while the other saves the hooked player. B.) your teammates can say screw u and continue getting the Generators, now if they do decide to get the Gens, simply continue to be hooked, till u completely bleedout inorder to ensure that the killer is distract for the max amount of time, so ur teammates gain some sort of advantage. With this being said, everyone should understand and know this detail. Now as far as the camping killer goes, your a completly idiot for doing so because u actuially obatin less points when u sit their as the killer, waiting for the survivor to die. it is best to let them get rescued, so u can chop them up again gaining a second round of points and so on and so forth. U only obtain like a 1000 points when the survivor dies, but if u let the survivor get rescued, then their is more points to be made as youll cut them down again. now that that is out of the way, stop camping please, it is pointless and a waste of ur time, considering youll get a significant amount of less points doing so. Now for those of u complaining about the survivors and killers abilities, stop right their anything u complain about there is most likely a perk or add on of some sort that will fix ur problem (for example: i saw a thread stating how when ur the wraith, your bells should not be heard, when going uninvisible if your standing still) well would u look at that, after reading that thread, i later came across that day of a add on that does exactly what the person said, legit there is a sacrificial piece that does that, so please for those of u complaining about the game with only 3 hours on ur belt, please stop complaining, because u havent played the game long enough to see its full features, the only thing id complain about is the match making, im personally getting sick of being put together with newbies that have zero skill and hide the enter time, grow a pair and go for it!!! dont just sit their caz ur scared, do something! like save a teammate, its not that hard to trick the killer. BTW hears a little advice, USE YOUR VOLUME AS A KEY TOOL! even when the wraith is invisible u can still hear him breathing, USE THAT TO UR ADVANTAGE!!! And people also dont realise that u make heavy amount of breathing when ur in a locker, THE KILLER CAN HEAR YOU, if hes smart enough to use his volume, u also make excesive amounts of noise, after youve been hit once, THE KILLER CAN HEAR THAT ASWELL, so if u ar the killer use ur volume to ur advantage its more usefull then most people realise, i genereally tell where the killer is just by listening and pointing my screen in the dirrection that sounds loudest. USE YOUR GOD FORSAKEN VOLUME! the only complaint i have is my mouse and keyboard sometimes stop working, but i think its because its wireless (DONT ASK WHAT KINDA GAMMER USES A WIRELESS CONTROLLER) i dont know what i was thinking X(, also theyre is a slight glitch occasionly where ur arm can poke out of the box, so be careful, also occasionally, ur guy will glitch into the air when the killer picks him up , also theyre is this one spot in one of the maps where if u get down then crawl into it, and get back up, u glitch and can nolonger get out even if the killer hits u, he cant even pick u up. OVERAL FANTASTIC GAME!!! Just wish my friends were more into it like me, they yelled at me caz i played with perks stating that ive played it to much and know the game better, well IDK what to tell them, play the god damn game more it just came out! btw still have no idea where my cover art is, or where the sound treacks are, got the deluxe but neither are in my steam?

One of the best games I have ever played. This game could be considered both team based, or solo based. That is all based on the mind set of both the survivors and killer. There is no AI in this game, so both parties can be as predictable as ever. A teammate could mean life or death, whether it's healing, saving from a hook, or extra asistance with distractions or working on generators. However you are very capable of living alone if that's your wish. The Survivor side has a few ways to juke the Killer, each way funnier than the next. Apparently, spinning in circles like a bike constantly turning is one of those ways. Killers have many ways to play, varied by perk sets or the Killer power. The game is very uniqe every match based on those variations, and gets a lot of meta shift with every new DLC (once the full potential of each new thing is understood). Great game with a usually smart player base, 9.5/10

EDIT: The player base isn't too smart. It's full of dipshit killers calling Survivors OP for some reason, even though they get overpowered perk sets and can camp making the game unplayable. Also Survivors bitch about a lot of things too, such as camping killers, except they actually deserve it.

This game has potential, but it's missing a ton of polish which is needed to make it shine. 

It's inspired by games such as Left 4 Dead and Evolve, but in my opinion it's more unique as it puts a spin on the idea. Did I mention it's rather creepy?

Recommended if you see it going cheap, and you enjoy games like L4D and Evolve.

I recommend waiting until the matchmaking is better. As it stands, you can't invite friends to a public game. And queueing at the same time as a friend is impractical as it seems to never put you in the same lobby.

Cibiliyetsiz cibiliyetsiz katille duo girip takımınızı bilerek öldürtmeyin iyi küfür yersiniz. Kaldı ki rank pek önemli değil önemli olan oyundan keyif almak..
Jenaratör tamiri yaparken cıyk diye bir ses gelir o sesi duyduktan sonra space basmaya hazır olun.Allah rızası için o sese kulak verin.
25 lwl a kadar güzel güzel oynayın sonra rank düşünürsünüz.
Arkadaşlarınıza yardım etmeye çalışın kazma olmayın mantıklı düşünün mesela katilin dikkatini biri çekince gidin o adamı kurtarın boş yere kaya arkasında beklemeyin. Darbe alan arkadasınızı mutlaka ne işiniz varsa bırrakın önce onu heallayın
Kalp atışlarınız mı hızlandı shifte basarak kosma arkanda iz bırakırsın bunu yapma nolur. git bi ağacın arkasına geç ne biliyim otlara uzan şöyle katilin seni bulmaması için eğilerek tam karsında tutmaya çalış.
Katil peşine mi düştü katili stunlamak veya atlatmak için tahtaların ve camların yogun oldugu yerlere kosun orda katakulleye getirin.
Genel olarak shift kullanmamaya çalışın katilin sizi gördüğünden emin olana kadar.
Heh bide skill açmadan o kancadan cıkmaya çalışmayın takımınızın zamanından yemeyin.. unutmayın oyunun tadını cıkarın gerilimine bırakın kendinizi ama sakin kalmayı da bilin :D Lwl atladıkca keyfiniz de artacak kendinize bir ana karakter belirleyip onu kasın her karakterin kendine ait skilleri var.

Eksiler olarak rank sistemi komple saçmalama arkadaslar keşke bi hotfix cıksa da hayatta kalabildiğin halde kaçabildiğin halde rank düşmesen.

Katil severler için de rank sistemi çok saçma adam dc olur veya rage quit atarsa puan alamayıp rank düşebiliyosun. ama genel olarak 2 adamı güzelce kovalarsan ve kancaya asıp öldürebilirsen rank atlaman mumkun.

Fps ve grafik ideal yer yer bug olabilir pek takmayın önemli olan eğlenmek ve gerçekten eğlenceli :)

I actually enjoy this game and plan on continuing to play it, but I can't recommend it for purchase in it's current state. The core game is there and it's fun, but plagued by several things that make it an unbalanced affair for everyone involved. Not to mention it seems the connection quality is based on the killer player and I've had too many matches where the rubberbanding/teleporting by either the surviviors or the killer makes the matches unplayable. I understand the game is supposed to be slightly in favor of the killers, but it's unbalanced all around right now.

The game needs: balancing for the Wraith, no auto rank downs just because you don't rank up, either better matchmaking or a connection quality requirement for hosts, Keys need to be able to be mapped, items that increase your chance to spawn at a certain level need to be changed to face a certain killer instead, so perks can be selected with strategy in mind. There are more, but those are the issues that come to mind first.

I want to see this game succeed and grow, but if it wants to avoid losing players it needs to be more agile when it comes to balancing and there are some basic requirements for solid online play that need to be tackled ASAP. It's also important to note you cannot form parties unless it's a private match. I know many people would love that feature and are not going to buy the game unless implemented. I understand why it wasn't included, but I'm sure there's plenty that would buy the game simply to play with friends.

EDIT: After recently playing. The game seems to be much more stable and balanced. I had a lot of fun and plan on playing more.

Adorei o jogo! Totalmente viciante! Me lembrou bastante aquela brincadeira de "polícia e ladrão" que brincava quando era criança. O clima de suspense causa muita imersão, sendo divertido até mesmo de assistir, não só de jogar. Cada partida é completamente diferente, proporcionando vários "sustos" novos! 

A parte gráfica está incrível, principalmente a interface e os ícones, tirando o fato de ter muitos elementos visuais que precisam ser "decorados". Algumas oferendas no começo do jogo, por exemplo, passam com um texto muito rápido que nem sempre dá pra acompanhar. A descrição dos perks dentro do jogo não podem ser consultados, somente antes de iniciar a partida.

Por fim, estou aguardando ansiosamente pelo "modo sobrevivência em grupo", já que adoro jogar com amigos. No momento, acho que é o que mais detestei no jogo (a falta dessa opção). Para jogar com meus amigos, demoramos muitos minutos até conseguirmos entrar na mesma sala, o que atrasa não só as nossas partidas, como de outros jogadores que ficam aguardando até a sala encher.
